channel.title: [PI using galkons client] -Two Problems+fix=1.5m RSGP
channel.description:
Hey guys, I need help with two problem's or possibly just the one.
I decided to use 'galkons Refractored based client' for my PI source, but when I tryed to log in I got this error and the Screen goes black in places:
[IMG]http://i723.photobucket.com/albums/ww237/Zezamu6/Untitled2.png[/img]
To fix it, I was told to delete or comment out this line of code in my [I]client.java[/I] [CODE]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Sanity")) { getPA().sendCrashFrame(); }[/CODE]
But it lead to the problem of my character becoming invisible while playing... (and yes I tried the make over mage which did shit all)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'll reward anybody who can fix this with a little more that [I]1.5m RSGP[/I]
[IMG]http://i723.photobucket.com/albums/ww237/Zezamu6/Untitled-5.png[/img] (as you can see, it has that new hatchet, so it can't be a RSPS! )
You will need to at least have TeamVeiwer and an MSN or just message below and I'll keep checking up on it
Thanks all
I researched as much as I could, but my journey hopefully ends here :)

item.title: [PI using galkons client] -Two Problems+fix=1.5m RSGP
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

If I were you I would use a different source, since PI has memory leaks. Also PI used Galkon’s Renamed client to start with. Just use the client that the source came with. If you want me to verify that the client is renamed I will… Just send me the client in a pm. Also, if you want to check yourself, just check to see if you see classes like ItemDef, Entity, and the likes. This means that it is renamed. Those classes in a non-renamed client would be Class8 and Class5.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI using galkons client] -Two Problems+fix=1.5m RSGP
item.dc:creator: @peanut_ninja peanut ninja
item.description:
@peanut_ninja wrote:

Because I’m rather fresh here and it seams as though there are alot of guides for galkons client and thought it would be a huge opotunity to learn at a much higher rate
And also, I am pretty sure that there wouldn’t be any restraints that stop any other clients from loading galkons refractor client other than the crashframe because I’m using the original PI source

Read full topic

item.title: [PI using galkons client] -Two Problems+fix=1.5m RSGP
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Why the change of clients? Your source most likely has something set just for that client. Also your getting a packet error when you try loading a region. Possibly the region packet? not sure.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI using galkons client] -Two Problems+fix=1.5m RSGP
item.dc:creator: @peanut_ninja peanut ninja
item.description:
@peanut_ninja wrote:

Hey guys, I need help with two problem’s or possibly just the one.

I decided to use ‘galkons Refractored based client’ for my PI source, but when I tryed to log in I got this error and the Screen goes black in places:

To fix it, I was told to delete or comment out this line of code in my client.java

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Sanity")) { getPA().sendCrashFrame(); }

But it lead to the problem of my character becoming invisible while playing…
(and yes I tried the make over mage which did shit all)

I’ll reward anybody who can fix this with a little more that 1.5m RSGP


(as you can see, it has that new hatchet, so it can’t be a RSPS! )

You will need to at least have TeamVeiwer and an MSN or just message below and I’ll keep checking up on it

Thanks all

I researched as much as I could, but my journey hopefully ends here
